name: 3D Platformer - Tutorial (Erinsa)
description:
Proposed Modifications:

1.  New Levels: I intend to create 1-2 new levels with completely new level design and terrain. I plan to use the given art to create new themes as well. I am excited about the possibilities using the given hallways, and other terrain as well. 

2.  Making the player death effect more interesting: I saw this one in the modification list and it really interests me! I enjoyed working with particles for the double jump effect and would like another opportunity to potentially work with particles among other techniques. 

3.  New game music: I've been wanting to make new game music for one of the projects and now seems like the time to do it! I have access to GarageBand, and other  music making software, so I will use that to create a new, unique soundtrack for our little astronaut to jam to. 

Credits: 

Created By: Erin Sawyer
